      • isMovable

        public boolean isMovable(Direction direction)
        Check if the object is movable to the given direction. If there is no wall in the given direction, it can move and returns true. Otherwise, return false;
        参数:
        direction - The direction the object intends to move.
        返回:
        true if it is movable. Otherwise, false
